Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Fedora Audit System with a Triplestore backend Camel-based audit system built with a triplestore backend
Fedora Indexing Service with a Solr backend Camel-based indexing service for Solr
Fedora Indexing Service with a Triplestore backend Camel-based indexing service for an external triplestore
Web-deployed wrapper for Camel components Camel-based application including components deployable to web containers
